fields.text: Welcome to Uber in San Francisco, where you can get a ride in minutes or earn on your schedule.
If you need help with an existing ride, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to a rider support specialist.
For fare estimates or new bookings, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our booking support team.
To start your driver application, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we transfer you to our driver sign-up team.
Please hold while we connect you to driver support.
